transliteration: Gaavan Thudhhano Eesar Brehamaa Dhaevee Sohan Thaerae Sadha Savaarae ||

transliteration: Gaavan Thudhhano Eindhr Eindhraasan Baithae Dhaevathiaa Dhar Naalae ||
translation: Indra, seated on His Throne, sings of You, with the deities at Your Door.

gurmukhi: gwvin quDno isD smwDI AMdir gwvin quDno swD bIcwry ]
transliteration: Gaavan Thudhhano Sidhh Samaadhhee Andhr Gaavan Thudhhano Saadhh Beechaarae ||
translation: The Siddhas in Samaadhi sing of You; the Saadhus sing of You in contemplation.

transliteration: Gaavan Thudhhano Jathee Sathee Santhokhee Gaavan Thudhhano Veer Karaarae ||
translation: The celibates, the fanatics, and the peacefully accepting sing of You; the fearless warriors sing of You.

transliteration: Gaavan Thudhhano Mohaneeaa Man Mohan Surag Mashh Paeiaalae ||
translation: The Mohinis, the enchanting heavenly beauties who entice hearts in paradise, in this world, and in the underworld of the subconscious, sing of You.

gurmukhi: gwvin quDno rqn aupwey qyry ATsiT qIrQ nwly ]
transliteration: Gaavan Thudhhano Rathan Oupaaeae Thaerae Athasath Theerathh Naalae ||
translation: The celestial jewels created by You, and the sixty-eight sacred shrines of pilgrimage, sing of You.

gurmukhi: gwvin quDno joD mhwbl sUrw gwvin quDno KwxI cwry ]
transliteration: Gaavan Thudhhano Jodhh Mehaabal Sooraa Gaavan Thudhhano Khaanee Chaarae ||
translation: The brave and mighty warriors sing of You. The spiritual heroes and the four sources of creation sing of You.

gurmukhi: gwvin quDno KMf mMfl bRhmMfw kir kir rKy qyry Dwry ]
transliteration: Gaavan Thudhhano Khandd Manddal Brehamanddaa Kar Kar Rakhae Thaerae Dhhaarae ||
translation: The worlds, solar systems and galaxies, created and arranged by Your Hand, sing of You.

gurmukhi: syeI quDno gwvin jo quDu Bwvin rqy qyry Bgq rswly ]
transliteration: Saeee Thudhhano Gaavan Jo Thudhh Bhaavan Rathae Thaerae Bhagath Rasaalae ||
translation: They alone sing of You, who are pleasing to Your Will. Your devotees are imbued with Your Sublime Essence.

transliteration: Hor Kaethae Thudhhano Gaavan Sae Mai Chith N Aavan Naanak Kiaa Beechaarae ||
translation: So many others sing of You, they do not come to mind. O Nanak, how can I think of them all?

gurmukhi: soeI soeI sdw scu swihbu swcw swcI nweI ]

translation: O humble servant of the Lord, O True Guru, O True Primal Being: I offer my humble prayer to You, O Guru.

translation: Obtaining the Name of the Lord, Har, Har, they are satisfied; joining the Sangat, the Blessed Congregation, their virtues shine forth. ||2||

transliteration: Jin Har Har Har Ras Naam N Paaeiaa Thae Bhaageheen Jam Paas ||
translation: Those who have not obtained the Sublime Essence of the Name of the Lord, Har, Har, Har, are most unfortunate; they are led away by the Messenger of Death.

gurmukhi: jo siqgur srix sMgiq nhI Awey iDRgu jIvy iDRgu jIvwis ]3]

translation: Those who have not sought the Sanctuary of the True Guru and the Sangat, the Holy Congregation-cursed are their lives, and cursed are their hopes of life. ||3||

transliteration: Jin Har Jan Sathigur Sangath Paaee Thin Dhhur Masathak Likhiaa Likhaas ||
translation: Those humble servants of the Lord who have attained the Company of the True Guru, have such pre-ordained destiny inscribed on their foreheads.

translation: Blessed, blessed is the Sat Sangat, the True Congregation, where the Lord's Essence is obtained. Meeting with His humble servant, O Nanak, the Light of the Naam shines forth. ||4||4||

gurmukhi: rwgu gUjrI mhlw 5 ]

translation: Raag Goojaree, Fifth Mehl:

translation: Why, O mind, do you plot and plan, when the Dear Lord Himself provides for your care?

gurmukhi: myry mwDau jI sqsMgiq imly su qirAw ]

translation: O my Dear Lord of souls, one who joins the Sat Sangat, the True Congregation, is saved.

gurmukhi: gur prswid prm pdu pwieAw sUky kwst hirAw ]1] rhwau ]

translation: By Guru's Grace, the supreme status is obtained, and the dry wood blossoms forth again in lush greenery. ||1||Pause||

translation: Mothers, fathers, friends, children and spouses-no one is the support of anyone else.

translation: Who feeds them, and who teaches them to feed themselves? Have you ever thought of this in your mind? ||3||

translation: All the nine treasures, and the eighteen supernatural powers are held by our Lord and Master in the Palm of His Hand.

translation: Servant Nanak is devoted, dedicated, forever a sacrifice to You, Lord. Your Expanse has no limit, no boundary. ||4||5||

gurmukhi: < siqgur pRswid ]
transliteration: Ik Oankaar Sathigur Prasaadh ||

transliteration: So Purakh Niranjan Har Purakh Niranjan Har Agamaa Agam Apaaraa ||

transliteration: Sabh Jeea Thumaarae Jee Thoon Jeeaa Kaa Dhaathaaraa ||

gurmukhi: hir iDAwvhu sMqhu jI siB dUK ivswrxhwrw ]
transliteration: Har Dhhiaavahu Santhahu Jee Sabh Dhookh Visaaranehaaraa ||

gurmukhi: qUM Gt Gt AMqir srb inrMqir jI hir eyko purKu smwxw ]
transliteration: Thoon Ghatt Ghatt Anthar Sarab Niranthar Jee Har Eaeko Purakh Samaanaa ||

gurmukhi: ieik dwqy ieik ByKwrI jI siB qyry coj ivfwxw ]
transliteration: Eik Dhaathae Eik Bhaekhaaree Jee Sabh Thaerae Choj Viddaanaa ||
translation: Some are givers, and some are beggars. This is all Your Wondrous Play.

gurmukhi: qUM Awpy dwqw Awpy Bugqw jI hau quDu ibnu Avru n jwxw ]
transliteration: Thoon Aapae Dhaathaa Aapae Bhugathaa Jee Ho Thudhh Bin Avar N Jaanaa ||

gurmukhi: qUM pwrbRhmu byAMqu byAMqu jI qyry ikAw gux AwiK vKwxw ]
transliteration: Thoon Paarabreham Baeanth Baeanth Jee Thaerae Kiaa Gun Aakh Vakhaanaa ||
translation: You are the Supreme Lord God, Limitless and Infinite. What Virtues of Yours can I speak of and describe?

transliteration: Har Dhhiaavehi Har Dhhiaavehi Thudhh Jee Sae Jan Jug Mehi Sukhavaasee ||
translation: Those who meditate on You, Lord, those who meditate on You-those humble beings dwell in peace in this world.

transliteration: Sae Mukath Sae Mukath Bheae Jin Har Dhhiaaeiaa Jee Thin Thoottee Jam Kee Faasee ||
translation: They are liberated, they are liberated-those who meditate on the Lord. For them, the noose of death is cut away.

transliteration: Jin Nirabho Jin Har Nirabho Dhhiaaeiaa Jee Thin Kaa Bho Sabh Gavaasee ||

transliteration: Sae Dhhann Sae Dhhann Jin Har Dhhiaaeiaa Jee Jan Naanak Thin Bal Jaasee ||3||
translation: Blessed are they, blessed are they, who meditate on their Dear Lord. Servant Nanak is a sacrifice to them. ||3||

gurmukhi: qyrI Bgiq qyrI Bgiq BMfwr jI Bry ibAMq byAMqw ]
transliteration: Thaeree Bhagath Thaeree Bhagath Bhanddaar Jee Bharae Bianth Baeanthaa ||

translation: Your devotees, Your devotees praise You, Dear Lord, in many and various and countless ways.

transliteration: Thaeree Anik Thaeree Anik Karehi Har Poojaa Jee Thap Thaapehi Japehi Baeanthaa ||
translation: For You, many, for You, so very many perform worship services, O Dear Infinite Lord; they practice disciplined meditation and chant endlessly.

transliteration: Thaerae Anaek Thaerae Anaek Parrehi Bahu Simrith Saasath Jee Kar Kiriaa Khatt Karam Karanthaa ||
translation: For You, many, for You, so very many read the various Simritees and Shaastras. They perform rituals and religious rites.

transliteration: Sae Bhagath Sae Bhagath Bhalae Jan Naanak Jee Jo Bhaavehi Maerae Har Bhagavanthaa ||4||
translation: Those devotees, those devotees are sublime, O servant Nanak, who are pleasing to my Dear Lord God. ||4||

gurmukhi: qUM Awid purKu AprMpru krqw jI quDu jyvfu Avru n koeI ]
transliteration: Thoon Aadh Purakh Apranpar Karathaa Jee Thudhh Jaevadd Avar N Koee ||
translation: You are the Primal Being, the Most Wonderful Creator. There is no other as Great as You.

gurmukhi: qUM jugu jugu eyko sdw sdw qUM eyko jI qUM inhclu krqw soeI ]
transliteration: Thoon Jug Jug Eaeko Sadha Sadha Thoon Eaeko Jee Thoon Nihachal Karathaa Soee ||
translation: Age after age, You are the One. Forever and ever, You are the One. You never change, O Creator Lord.

gurmukhi: quDu Awpy BwvY soeI vrqY jI qUM Awpy krih su hoeI ]
transliteration: Thudhh Aapae Bhaavai Soee Varathai Jee Thoon Aapae Karehi S Hoee ||

transliteration: Thudhh Aapae Srisatt Sabh Oupaaee Jee Thudhh Aapae Siraj Sabh Goee ||
translation: You Yourself created the entire universe, and having fashioned it, You Yourself shall destroy it all.

gurmukhi: jnu nwnku gux gwvY krqy ky jI jo sBsY kw jwxoeI ]5]1]
transliteration: Jan Naanak Gun Gaavai Karathae Kae Jee Jo Sabhasai Kaa Jaanoee ||5||1||
translation: Servant Nanak sings the Glorious Praises of the Dear Creator, the Knower of all. ||5||1||

gurmukhi: Awsw mhlw 4 ]
transliteration: Aasaa Mehalaa 4 ||
translation: Aasaa, Fourth Mehl:

gurmukhi: qUM krqw sicAwru mYfw swˆeI ]
transliteration: Thoon Karathaa Sachiaar Maiddaa Saanee ||
translation: You are the True Creator, my Lord and Master.

translation: Whatever pleases You comes to pass. As You give, so do we receive. ||1||Pause||

transliteration: Sabh Thaeree Thoon Sabhanee Dhhiaaeiaa ||
translation: All belong to You, all meditate on you.

transliteration: Jis No Kirapaa Karehi Thin Naam Rathan Paaeiaa ||
translation: Those who are blessed with Your Mercy obtain the Jewel of the Naam, the Name of the Lord.

transliteration: Guramukh Laadhhaa Manamukh Gavaaeiaa ||
translation: The Gurmukhs obtain it, and the self-willed manmukhs lose it.

transliteration: Thudhh Aap Vishhorriaa Aap Milaaeiaa ||1||
translation: You Yourself separate them from Yourself, and You Yourself reunite with them again. ||1||

translation: You are the River of Life; all are within You.

transliteration: Thujh Bin Dhoojaa Koee Naahi ||
translation: There is no one except You.

transliteration: Jis No Thoo Jaanaaeihi Soee Jan Jaanai ||
translation: They alone understand, whom You inspire to understand;

gurmukhi: hir gux sd hI AwiK vKwxY ]
transliteration: Har Gun Sadh Hee Aakh Vakhaanai ||
translation: They continually chant and repeat the Lord's Praises.

gurmukhi: ijin hir syivAw iqin suKu pwieAw ]
transliteration: Jin Har Saeviaa Thin Sukh Paaeiaa ||
translation: Those who serve You find peace.

gurmukhi: shjy hI hir nwim smwieAw ]3]

gurmukhi: quDu ibnu dUjw Avru n koie ]

translation: In the swamp of emotional attachment, their feet cannot move. I have seen them drowning there. ||1||

gurmukhi: mn eyku n cyqis mUV mnw ]

translation: In your mind, you do not remember the One Lord-you fool!

gurmukhi: imlu swDsMgiq Bju kyvl nwm ]1]

transliteration: Saevaa Saadhh N Jaaniaa Har Raaeiaa ||

gurmukhi: khu nwnk hm nIc krMmw ]
transliteration: Kahu Naanak Ham Neech Karanmaa ||
translation: Says Nanak, my actions are contemptible!

gurmukhi: srix pry kI rwKhu srmw ]2]4]
transliteration: Saran Prae Kee Raakhahu Saramaa ||2||4||
translation: O Lord, I seek Your Sanctuary; please, preserve my honor! ||2||4||

gurmukhi: < siqgur pRswid ]
transliteration: Ik Oankaar Sat(i)gura Prasaadh ॥
translation: The Lord is One and He can be attained through the Grace of The True Guru.

gurmukhi: kbXo bwc bynqI ]
transliteration: Kabayo Baacha Benatee ॥
translation: Speech of the poet.

gurmukhi: cOpeI ]
transliteration: Chaupaee ॥
translation: Chaupai

gurmukhi: hmrI kro hwQ dY r`Cw ] pUrn hoie ic`q kI ie`Cw ]
transliteration: Hamaree Karo Haath Dai Rachchhaa ॥ Poorana Hoei Chitta Kee Eichchhaa ॥
translation: Protect me O Lord ! with Thine own Hands all the desires of my heart be fulfilled.

gurmukhi: qv crnn mn rhY hmwrw ] Apnw jwn kro pRiqpwrw ]377]

translation: Let my mind rest under Thy Feet; sustain me, considering me Thine own.377.

gurmukhi: hmry duSt sBY qum Gwvhu ] Awpu hwQ dY moih bcwvhu ]

gurmukhi: suKI bsY moro pirvwrw ] syvk is`KX sBY krqwrw ]378]
transliteration: Sukhee Basai Moro Parivaara ॥ Sevaka Sikkhaya Sabhai Karataara ॥378॥
translation: May my family live in comfort and ease alongwith all my servants and disciples.378.

gurmukhi: mo r`Cw inju kr dY kirXY ] sB bYirn kO Awj sMGirXY ]
transliteration: Mo Rachchhaa Niju Kara Dai Kariyai ॥ Sabha Bairina Kou Aaja Saanghariyai ॥
translation: Protect me O Lord ! with Thine own Hands and destroy this day all my enemies;

gurmukhi: pUrn hoie hmwrI Awsw ] qoir Bjn kI rhY ipXwsw ]379]
transliteration: Poorana Hoei Hamaaree Aasa ॥ Tori Bhajana Kee Rahai Piyaasa ॥379॥
translation: May all the aspirations be fulfilled; let my thirst for Thy Name remain afresh.379.

translation: I may remember none else except Thee; and obtain all the required boons from Thee;

transliteration: Sevaka Sikkhaya Hamaare Taariyahi ॥ Chuna Chuna Shattru Hamaare Maariyahi ॥380॥
translation: Let my servants and disciples cross the world-ocean; all my enemies be singled out and killed.380.

gurmukhi: Awpu hwQ dY muJY aubirXY ] mrn kwl qRws invirXY ]

transliteration: Hoojo Sadaa Hamaare Pachchhaa ॥ Sree Asidhuja Joo Kariyahu Rachchhaa ॥381॥
translation: May Thou ever Bestow Thy favours on my side; Protect me O Lord ! Thou, the Supreme Destroyer.381.

gurmukhi: rwiK lyhu muih rwKnhwry ] swihb sMq shwie ipXwry ]
transliteration: Raakhi Lehu Muhi Raakhanahaare ॥ Saahiba Saant Sahaaei Piyaare ॥
translation: Protect me, O Lord ! Thou, the Protector, O Lord ! Most dear, the Protector of the Saints:

gurmukhi: dInbMDu duStn ky hMqw ] qumho purI cqurds kMqw ]382]
transliteration: Deenabaandhu Dushattna Ke Haanta ॥ Tumaho Puree Chaturadasa Kaanta ॥382॥
translation: Friend of poor and the Destroyer of the enemies; Thou art the Master of the fourteen worlds.382.

gurmukhi: kwl pwie bRhmw bpu Drw ] kwl pwie iSvjU Avqrw ]

translation: In due time Brahma appeared in physical form; in due time Shiva incarnated;

gurmukhi: kwl pwie kir ibSn pRkwSw ] skl kwl kw kIXw qmwSw ]383]
transliteration: Kaal Paaei Kari Bishana Prakaashaa ॥ Sakala Kaal Kaa Keeyaa Tamaashaa ॥383॥
translation: In due time Vishnu manifested himself; all this is the play of the Temporal Lord.383.

translation: The Temporal Lord, who created Shiva, the Yogi; who created Brahma, the Master of the Vedas;

transliteration: Javana Kaal Sabha Lok Savaara ॥ Namashakaar Hai Taahi Hamaara ॥384॥
translation: The Temporal Lord who fashioned the entire world; I salute the same Lord.384.

gurmukhi: jvn kwl sB jgq bnwXo ] dyv dYq j`Cn aupjwXo ]

translation: The Temporal Lord, who created the whole world; who created gods, demons and yakshas;

transliteration: Aadi Aanti Eekai Avataara ॥ Soeala Guroo Samajhiyahu Hamaara ॥385॥
translation: He is the only one form the beginning to the end; I consider Him only my Guru.385.

gurmukhi: nmSkwr iqs hI ko hmwrI ] skl pRjw ijn Awp svwrI ]
transliteration: Namashakaar Tisa Hee Ko Hamaaree ॥ Sakala Prajaa Jina Aapa Savaaree ॥
translation: I salute Him, non else, but Him; who has created Himself and His subject;

gurmukhi: isvkn ko svgun suK dIXo ] S`qRun ko pl mo bD kIXo ]386]

translation: He bestows Divine virtues and happiness on His servants; He destroys the enemies instantly.386.

gurmukhi: Gt Gt ky AMqr kI jwnq ] Bly bury kI pIr pCwnq ]
transliteration: Ghatt Ghatt Ke Aantr Kee Jaanata ॥ Bhale Bure Kee Peera Pachhaanata ॥
translation: He knows the inner feelings of every heart; He knows the anguish of both good and bad;

gurmukhi: cItI qy kuMcr AsQUlw ] sB pr ikRpw idRSit kir PUlw ]387]
transliteration: Cheettee Te Kuanchara Asathoolaa ॥ Sabha Pra Karipaa Darishatti Kari Phoolaa ॥387॥
translation: From the ant to the solid elephant; He casts His Graceful glance on all and feels pleased.387.

gurmukhi: sMqn duK pwey qy duKI ] suK pwey swDn ky suKI ]

translation: He is painful, when He sees His saints in grief; He is happy, when His saints are happy.

gurmukhi: eyk eyk kI pIr pCwnY ] Gt Gt ky pt pt kI jwnY ]388]
transliteration: Eeka Eeka Kee Peera Pachhaanai ॥ Ghatt Ghatt Ke Patt Patt Kee Jaanai ॥388॥
translation: He knows the agony of everyone; He knows the innermost secrets of every heart.388.

gurmukhi: jb audkrK krw krqwrw ] pRjw Drq qb dyh Apwrw ]
transliteration: Jaba Audakarakha Karaa Karataara ॥ Prajaa Dharata Taba Deha Apaara ॥
translation: When the Creator projected Himself, His creation manifested itself in innumerable forms;

gurmukhi: jb AwkrK krq ho kbhUM ] qum mY imlq dyh Dr sBhUM ]389]
transliteration: Jaba Aakarakha Karata Ho Kabahooan ॥ Tuma Mai Milata Deha Dhara Sabhahooan ॥389॥
translation: When at any time He withdraws His creation, all the physical forms are merged in Him.389.

gurmukhi: jyqy bdn isRSit sB DwrY ] Awpu AwpunI bUiJ aucwrY ]

translation: All the bodies of living beings created in the world speak about Him according to their understanding;

gurmukhi: qum sB hI qy rhq inrwlm ] jwnq byd Byd Aru Awlm ]390]
transliteration: Tuma Sabha Hee Te Rahata Niraalma ॥ Jaanata Beda Bheda Aru Aalma ॥390॥
translation: But Thou, O Lord ! live quite apart form everything; this fact is know to the Vedas and the learned.390.

gurmukhi: inrMkwr inRibkwr inRlMB ] Awid AnIl Anwid AsMB ]

translation: The Lord is Formless, Sinless and shelterless: He is the Primal Power, Blemishlless, Behinningless and Unborn;

transliteration: Taakaa Moorharaha Auchaarta Bhedaa ॥ Jaako Bheva Na Paavta Bedaa ॥391॥
translation: The fool claims boastfully about the knowledge of His secrets, which even the Vedas do not know.391.

gurmukhi: qwkO kir pwhn Anumwnq ] mhW mUVH kCu Byd n jwnq ]

translation: Attuned to the True Guru, you shall receive a place of honor in the Court of the Lord.

gurmukhi: khu nwnk ikrpw kry ijs no eyh vQu dyie ]
transliteration: Kahu Naanak Kirapaa Karae Jis No Eaeh Vathh Dhaee ||
translation: Says Nanak, this treasure is bestowed on those who are blessed with His Mercy.

gurmukhi: jg mih auqm kwFIAih ivrly kyeI kyie ]1]
transliteration: Jag Mehi Outham Kaadteeahi Viralae Kaeee Kaee ||1||
translation: In the midst of the world, they are known as the most pious - they are rare indeed. ||1||

gurmukhi: mÚ 5 ]
transliteration: Ma 5 ||
translation: Fifth Mehl:

gurmukhi: rKy rKxhwir Awip aubwirAnu ]
transliteration: Rakhae Rakhanehaar Aap Oubaarian ||
translation: O Savior Lord, save us and take us across.

gurmukhi: gur kI pYrI pwie kwj svwirAnu ]
transliteration: Gur Kee Pairee Paae Kaaj Savaarian ||
translation: Falling at the feet of the Guru, our works are embellished with perfection.

gurmukhi: hoAw Awip dieAwlu mnhu n ivswirAnu ]
transliteration: Hoaa Aap Dhaeiaal Manahu N Visaarian ||
translation: You have become kind, merciful and compassionate; we do not forget You from our minds.

gurmukhi: swD jnw kY sMig Bvjlu qwirAnu ]
transliteration: Saadhh Janaa Kai Sang Bhavajal Thaarian ||
translation: In the Saadh Sangat, the Company of the Holy, we are carried across the terrifying world-ocean.

gurmukhi: swkq inMdk dust iKn mwih ibdwirAnu ]
transliteration: Saakath Nindhak Dhusatt Khin Maahi Bidhaarian ||
translation: In an instant, You have destroyed the faithless cynics and slanderous enemies.

gurmukhi: iqsu swihb kI tyk nwnk mnY mwih ]
transliteration: This Saahib Kee Ttaek Naanak Manai Maahi ||
translation: That Lord and Master is my Anchor and Support; O Nanak, hold firm in your mind.

gurmukhi: ijsu ismrq suKu hoie sgly dUK jwih ]2]
transliteration: Jis Simarath Sukh Hoe Sagalae Dhookh Jaahi ||2||
translation: Remembering Him in meditation, happiness comes, and all sorrows and pains simply vanish. ||2||
